leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 天文-观测数据处理与源检测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 校准→源检测→测光→匹配→平台

queries: [WEB] astronomy image classification deep learning github

tools.name: RESSPECT
tools.one_line_profile: Recommendation system for telescope resource allocation in supernova cosmology
tools.detailed_description: A recommendation system framework developed by COIN and LSST DESC to optimize telescope resource allocation for photometric supernova cosmology analysis. It aids in planning spectroscopic follow-up observations.

tools.name: lume-astra
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the ASTRA space charge tracking algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface for ASTRA (A Space Charge Tracking Algorithm), enabling the configuration, execution, and analysis of particle accelerator simulations within the LUME framework.

tools.name: snmachine
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning pipeline for photometric supernova classification
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning library developed by LSST DESC for the classification of photometric supernova light curves. It provides tools for feature extraction and classification using various ML algorithms.

tools.name: astronomaly
tools.one_line_profile: General purpose anomaly detection framework for astronomical data
tools.detailed_description: A flexible framework designed for anomaly detection in astronomical datasets. It supports active learning and provides a visual interface to help astronomers identify and label interesting outliers in images or light curves.

tools.name: DeepCRE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for cis-regulatory element analysis in plants
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting gene expression levels based on cis-regulatory sequences (promoters and terminators) in model plants like Arabidopsis and Maize. It aids in deciphering the cis-regulatory code.

tools.name: ASTRA Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance GPU-accelerated tomography toolbox for 2D and 3D image reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: The ASTRA Toolbox is a MATLAB and Python platform for high-performance GPU primitives for 2D and 3D tomography, widely used in physics, biomedical imaging, and materials science for image reconstruction.

tools.name: astroCV
tools.one_line_profile: Computer vision library specifically designed for astronomical image processing
tools.detailed_description: AstroCV is a computer vision library tailored for astronomy, providing tools for image processing, source detection, and analysis of astronomical datasets.

tools.name: Astro R-CNN
tools.one_line_profile: Instance segmentation and source detection in astronomical images using Mask R-CNN
tools.detailed_description: Astro R-CNN applies deep learning (Mask R-CNN) to perform instance segmentation and object detection on astronomical images, aiding in the identification of celestial sources.

tools.name: ClaRAN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning classifier for radio galaxy morphologies
tools.detailed_description: ClaRAN (Classifying Radio sources Automatically with Neural networks) is a deep learning-based classifier designed to identify and classify the morphology of radio galaxies.

tools.name: morpheus.R
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for Morpheus matrix visualization and analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the Morpheus JavaScript library, enabling interactive heatmap visualization and matrix analysis within the R environment for bioinformatics.

tools.name: morpheus.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for interactive matrix visualization and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library for versatile matrix visualization and analysis, commonly used in bioinformatics for exploring heatmaps and high-dimensional data.

tools.name: Morpheus
tools.one_line_profile: Proteomics database search algorithm for mass spectrometry
tools.detailed_description: Morpheus is a mass spectrometry-based proteomics database search algorithm designed for high-resolution/high-mass accuracy data, facilitating peptide and protein identification.

tools.name: Cosmic-CoNN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for cosmic ray detection in astronomical images
tools.detailed_description: Cosmic-CoNN is a deep learning framework and toolkit designed to detect and remove cosmic rays from astronomical images, improving data quality for subsequent analysis.

tools.name: DeepFocus
tools.one_line_profile: Few-shot microscope slide auto-focusing using CNN
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a deep learning-based method for automated microscope slide focusing. It uses a sample-invariant CNN-based sharpness function to achieve fast and accurate auto-focusing in microscopy, which is critical for high-throughput biological imaging.

tools.name: Morpheus
tools.one_line_profile: Morphological semantic segmentation for astronomical images
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library designed for generating pixel-level morphological semantic segmentation maps of astronomical images. It is specifically tailored for source detection and classification in large-scale astronomical surveys, enabling automated analysis of galaxy morphology.

tools.name: Zoobot
tools.one_line_profile: Galaxy morphology classification using Bayesian CNNs
tools.detailed_description: A library for training and using Bayesian Convolutional Neural Networks to classify galaxy morphology. It is designed to work with Galaxy Zoo data and provides tools for predicting detailed morphological features of galaxies from images, supporting transfer learning for astronomical tasks.

tools.name: deepCR
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning based cosmic ray removal for astronomical images
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool designed to automatically detect and remove cosmic rays from astronomical images, serving as a robust alternative to traditional cleaning algorithms like LA Cosmic.

tools.name: MetaMorpheus
tools.one_line_profile: Proteomics search software with integrated calibration and PTM discovery
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive proteomics software environment that performs bottom-up, top-down, and label-free quantification analysis, featuring integrated mass calibration and post-translational modification discovery.

tools.name: ASTRA Simulator
tools.one_line_profile: High-altitude balloon flight path simulation tool
tools.detailed_description: A simulation tool for predicting the flight path and burst point of high-altitude balloons, used in atmospheric science and aerospace engineering.

tools.name: SuperNNova
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for photometric classification of supernovae
tools.detailed_description: An open-source framework for photometric classification of supernovae using deep learning, supporting various neural network architectures for light curve analysis.
